content:
For anyone interested, the Rust Gamedev Meetup is happening in about 30 minutes. The stream follows a "show-and-tell" format. You can either join the live channel on Discord, or watch along on Youtube/Twitch :smiley:

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rustgamedev
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nLyiLnC5mn4
Discord event: https://discord.gg/ftStPUY7?event=909099536381771826
